#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

spring-roo-addon-max 설치에 대해서 설명한다.


= install =
 * > osgi start --url http://spring-roo-addon-max.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/test/addon/com.ks.spring.roo.addon.maxservice-0.1.0.M1.jar 
 *  > osgi start --url http://spring-roo-addon-max.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/test/addon/com.ks.spring.roo.addon.maxweb-0.1.0.M1.jar 
 *  > osgi start --url http://spring-roo-addon-max.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/test/addon/com.ks.spring.roo.addon.maxsetup-0.1.0.M1.jar 
 *  > osgi ps
= uninstall =
 *  > osgi uninstall --bundleSymbolicName com.ks.spring.roo.addon.maxservice
 *  > osgi uninstall --bundleSymbolicName com.ks.spring.roo.addon.maxweb
 *  > osgi uninstall --bundleSymbolicName com.ks.spring.roo.addon.maxsetup
